Posts.EditableText:
Hello again everybody. Unfortunately I wasn't able to get any beta testers, but I have spent some more time testing the game myself, and feel that it makes sense to release it at this point. I wouldn't be surprised if there's still a typo lurking here or there, so please let me know about any that you find (do be mindful that I use American English, however).

For those of you who haven't seen the first post, the gameplay style has similarities to games such as Enchanter, Whitefield Academy of Witchcraft, and Augmented Fourth, so if you enjoy any of those games you might want to give this one a try!

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/j-mkijvrhee-u5bu2ohw-q/dance-quest
